strings.INFORMATION_SOURCES_EXPLANATION: where the information for this Xarta came from
strings.GLOBAL_TEMPLATE_TIP: to apply a global template with HTML customization, go to the settings page.
strings.CODE_INJECTION_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Include <style> or <script> tags to customize your Xarta
strings.DEMO_MODE_ENABLED_TEXT: This version of Xarta is for demonstration purposes only to showcase its functionality and dynamics. Click on Edit to see the editing screen or click anywhere else on the cards below to view the published version.
strings.ASSOCIATED_TO_ORG_TEXT: You are associated with the organization
strings.CARD_COUNT_SUMMARY: You have {postsCount} cards ({draftPostsCount} in draft, {publishedPostsCount} published, with {publiclyAvailableCount} publicly available)
strings.ERROR_SETTINGS_NOT_SAVED: There was an error trying to update the settings
strings.CONFIRM_SIGNOUT_TEXT: Are you sure you want to sign out?
strings.TEMPLATE_EXPLANATION_TEXT: The HTML customization fields below will be applied to all Xartas on the site.
strings.XARTA_FOOTER_TEXT: Xarta is a project developed by Núcleo Jornalismo and distributed under the MIT open-source license. <knowmore>Learn more here</knowmore> about the distribution license.
strings.A_MINI_CMS_TEXT: A mini CMS to keep your content always updated
strings.A_PROJECT_BY_TEXT: A project by <nucleolink>Núcleo Jornalismo</nucleolink> 2024 • Made with <ghostlink>Ghost</ghostlink> and <nextlink>Next.js</nextlink>
strings.AGREE_CREATIVE_COMMONS_LABEL: I agree to reproduce this context on other websites under the Creative Commons license (optional).
strings.CANNOT_DELETE_UNSAVED_XARTA_TEXT: You cannot delete your Xarta because it has not been saved or published yet.
strings.DIALOG_CONFIRM_ACTION: Are you sure you want to {mode, select, create {discard} other {delete}} this card?
strings.INCLUDE_TITLE_AND_CONTEXT_TO_SAVE: Please include a title and context to save your Xarta
strings.DIALOG_CONFIRM_UNPUBLISH: Are you sure you want to unpublish this card?
strings.TITLE_MISSING_FOR_ACTION: Please include a title and context to {postStatus, select, published {update} other {publish}} your Xarta
strings.DEMO_MODE_WARNING_TEXT: Warning: This is only a test user and does not have permission to update, publish, or remove posts.
strings.VIEW_XARTA_TITLE: View {postStatus, select, published {Published} other {in Draft}} Xarta
strings.PUBLISH_XARTA_FIRST: This Xarta is in Draft mode, to obtain the embeddable code first publish the Xarta.
strings.HTML_CODE_COPIED_SUCCESSFULLY_DESCRIPTIO: Paste the code on your site to integrate it with Xarta
strings.CREATIVE_COMMONS_ALLOWED: The creator of this Xarta has allowed its reproduction via Creative Commons 4.0 License. Use the code above to embed it on your site or visit <previewlink>this page</previewlink> to see the published post
